TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DispositionTypeNames extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Supplies the strings used to specify the disposition type for an e-mail attachment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The values in this enumeration can be used to set the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType%2A> property for an e-mail attachment. The information in the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> class represents the MIME Content-Disposition header. This header is described in RFC 2183 available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
## Examples The following code example sets the disposition type for an attachment.
[!code-cpp[NclMailSync#26](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.net.mime.dispos_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NclMailSync#26](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.net.mime.dispos_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Specifies that the attachment is to be displayed as a file attached to the e-mail message.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example sets the disposition type for an attachment.
[!code-cpp[NclMailSync#24](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.net.mime.dispos_0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NclMailSync#24](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.net.mime.dispos_0_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Specifies that the attachment is to be displayed as part of the e-mail message body.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example sets the disposition type for an attachment.
[!code-cpp[NclMailSync#26](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.net.mime.dispos_1_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NclMailSync#26](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.net.mime.dispos_1_1.cs)]
